Joseph Putz

714 W Rockwell Street · Arlington Heights, IL 60005 · (847) 347-3341 · josephputz89@gmail.com

Full Stack Developer with experience using frontend and backend technologies such as Ruby, Rails, Node, JavaScript, and React. Prior background in historic conservation and museums, which has given strong research and task management skills and the discipline to work in a timely manner.

Interests

Apart from being a software engineering, I enjoy very little more than listening to music and reading. I also enjoy camping and generally getting away from the rest of the world.

But if I had to choose my one passion above all it's the simple act of creation, I enjoyed woodworking when I was younger, and now I have that same joy when writing both fiction and seeing my efforts come to fruition with programming.
